title: Omni Vol. 1: The Doctor Is In
description: What would you do if you could think faster than the speed of light?Gifted doctor Cecelia Cobbina was once held in the highest regard by peers and patients alike. But that was before an incident in Africa changed her life forever. Now with the ability to process thoughts at the speed of light, she faces the unimaginable burden of literally having an answer for everything. As the truth of her origin slowly comes into focus, Cecelia must overcome her fears and tackle the one mystery she can’t seem to crack: the truth behind the Ignited.Written by fan favorite author Devin Grayson (Nightwing, Black Widow), Doctor Cecelia Cobbina bursts on to the scene as the world’s newest favorite female hero. Just don’t call her that.
author: Devin Grayson
